snippet: Why, at a time of economic troubles, when excess is being forcibly rejected, should Gustav Klimt's "Golden Phase" of hyper-ornamentation be a touchstone in the fashion world? asks the IHT's fashion editor Suzy Menkes.
abstract: Why, at a time of economic troubles, when excess is being forcibly rejected, should Gustav Klimt's "Golden Phase" of hyper-ornamentation be a touchstone in the fashion world? asks the IHT's fashion editor Suzy Menkes.

headline.main: Is That a Klimt You're Wearing?
